products.title: Pura White Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The pura white voile blind has a soft uniform weave to it, and is one of the purest white sheer blind we offer in their range. With a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.description: The delicate mist voile blind is the purest white sheer blind we offer in their range. Made from wipeable pvc-coated fabric, this bright and cheery roller blind adds a splash of vitality and colour to your home. Available in a layer-loving roman blind or luscious curtain. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this roller blind comes with their free five year guarantee and customer-first service.

products.title: Baa Baa Pvc Matte Duckegg Roller Blind
products.description: Their baa baa range features cute sheep, with fashionable tartain, striped and checked coats, on a soft dandelion-dotted field. This duckegg baa-tastic design withits chic light blue colour palette and smiling cream sheep, is a nod to their farming and industrial history, and looks fantastic as a roller blind. Not only does this light-filtering fabric envoke feelings of softness with its design, its also made from pvc-coated material - making your new roller blind moisture-resistant, a must for kitchens, bathrooms or children's rooms.

products.title: Capella, Carbon Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: The wonderful thing about carbon silver is that it manages to combine the charm and sophistication of two metallic finishes in perfect harmony. The silver shines under the light, and the carbon provides balance and stability that allows you to transition between more luxurious pieces as you move around the room. Use carbon silver in the dining room where it can partner your new glass dining table with chrome frame.

products.title: Words, Spring - Roller Blind
products.description: The words spring is a white blind with grey and soft purple letters sprinkled over the top. A lightweight and high quality fabric allows the light to filter through, creating a sunny, cheery vibe in any room. Use the spring in the home office to reflect a business mind, and accentuate with dove grey walls, white furniture, and lilac stationery, which will lead to a cool, contemporary look that doesn't take itself too seriously.

products.title: Words, Summer - Roller Blind
products.description: The fun, alphabet sprinkled words summer is a bold, funky choice for your home, and you'll find yourself absentmindedly creating words from nowhere. The bright lime and vivid yellow are tempered by the subtle dove grey, and placed on an off-white background fabric that allows light to filter through at will. Use the summer in a family dining room to add fun and games to dinnertime, or hang in a child's bedroom to get them learning the alphabet without even thinking about it.

products.title: Words, Autumn - Roller Blind
products.description: Words in autumn is all about fun and games, with its scattered alphabet and bright, fruity orange tones. This light-filtering blind is made from quality, lightweight white fabric, and controlled by an easy-to-use roller mechanism. Add a vivid splash of colour to the kitchen, and accent it with oranges and greys all around. Or instead, settle amongst plain wallpaper in the kids' bedroom and match with funky colours to create a bold, fun look that will have them sure to go up to bed on time.

products.title: Anthology, Fire Brick - Roller Blind
products.description: Fire brick is the latest addition to their new anthology collection, and it's a design that is sure to live long in the memory. This isn't a fabric that glistens and sparkles, and yet it still manages to catch your eye from a variety of different angles. It's the subtle way in which the flecks of white break up the surface that do it. If you want to create a modern look that will stand the test of time, what better place for fire brick than the kitchen? You can match your tiles and flooring to the red brick shade which then leaves you with plenty of space for a secondary colour on your units and worktops.

products.title: Anthology, Fired Earth - Roller Blind
products.description: Anthology fired earth is a rich symphony of terracotta reds and calming whites that catches your eye the moment you walk in the room. The intricacy is what brings the fabric to life, and it's what will enable you to weave in half a dozen matching textures without crowding your space. We love the idea of using fired earth in the kitchen alongside some matching tiling and worktops. You could then paint the units a light graphite grey for a natural colour match you won't see anywhere else.

products.title: Anthology, Snowy Mountain - Roller Blind
products.description: Snow mountain provides a crisp white with a subtle hint of blue -perfect for injecting something a little unexpected into the mix. As you look closer you come to see that it's the quality of the weave that defines the fabric, and that it's just the level of detail you need to provide your interiors with new depth and clarity. Combine the blue undertone of snow mountain with a crisp apple green to create a light and vibrant space that doesn't overwhelm the senses.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey Roller Blind
products.description: This stylish japanese inspired design features a soft wash of grey with hints of white and touches of pink to give it the perfect balance of pastel colour. Little blossom sits on delicate branches giving this an air of peace and tranquillity. Ideal to dress up a light and airy room, gorgeous cherry blossom blackout serenity grey roller blind is made from a luxurious blackout faux silk and treated with pollergen a unique fabric treatment that neutralises pollen so helping to relieve hayfever symptoms.

products.title: Versailles Blackout Mushroom Roller Blind
products.description: Bring luxury to any family space with the practical versailles mushroom blackout roller blind. This print inspired by chic french interiors features an ornate pattern picked out in grey and exceptionally printed on convenient wipe-clean, blackout fabric. The subtle, two-tone design gives this intricate motif a simplicity that can be used to great effect. Layer with varying shades of grey to add depth and drama to a room.

products.title: Magnolia Blackout Inky Roller Blind
products.description: Magnolia blackout is a beautiful floral patterned fabric available in two lovely colours. This bold white and grey roller blind is perfect to add a floral touch to any room in your home. The neutral colours in the pattern also mean this blind will go with a lot of decors. products.title: Versailles Blackout Ivory Roller Blind
products.description: Versailles blackout ivory is a charming, classical electric blind with metallic textured pattern that gives it a premium finish. In the softest ivory, it gives rooms an airy feel and adds some real luxury to a window. Crafted with blackout material, it wont allow light to enter into your room when closed and the electrical operation makes it easy to operate. The blind is also treated with pollergen, this neutralises pollen so it doesnt disturb hayfever sufferers.

products.description: The maine ll blackout range is available in a choice of 3 beautiful colours. A perfect addition to any room for a very affordable price. products.title: Apollo, Endeavour - Roller Blind
products.description: The apollo in endeavour is as creamy as cream can be, making this the ideal choice for keeping a room looking light and airy, even when shut. The textured fabric of the apollo range adds some character to an otherwise neutral shade, adding depth to the lightweight material. The endeavour will pair wonderfully with browns and beiges for a confident contrasting look in a dining room or living room.

products.title: Anthology, Moonstone - Roller Blind
products.description: The natural weave of the anthology in moonstone gives you the best of it all; the benefits of a high quality dim-out blind, plus a light, outdoorsy feel. The grainy, woven fabric provides a blind that's built to last. Beige will match almost any dcor scheme, but the moonstone will look especially stylish in a contemporary country dining room, surrounded by deep browns and soft creams, or set against bolder reds in a cosy bedroom, where you can curl up and relax.

products.title: Kindling, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at kindling shadow you come to wonder about what it means. Is this a free-flowing modernist pattern? Or is it a homage to the floral prints that we all know and love? It can be whatever you want it to be, and with a refined combination of regal colour on show it can add anything you want to your decor too. The silver makes the perfect companion to coppers and golds. Use them as the finishing touches rather than the primary colours so that you don't overwhelm your interior.

products.title: Capella, Atlantic Mystic - Roller Blind
products.description: As you take in atlantic mystic you come to see just how much work has gone into creating the delicate silver patterning. The way in which the artisan silver threads shimmer underneath the light gives the florals a life of their own. One which you get to celebrate every time you look at your new roller blinds. Taking a chance and being bold with your colours is what mystic allows you to do. The silver and blue work wonders when set against a matching red.

products.title: Delicia, Aquamarine - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at delicia aquamarine you will see the relaxed cream background contrasting with the vibrant electric blue petals. This allows you to see two different sides of the colour spectrum at the same time, and to understand that they can harmonise in unexpected ways. Embrace the vitality of the blue by matching it with a crisp apple green. This will enable you to breathe new life into any space, and to do it in a way that introduces plenty of natural colour and vitality.

products.title: Capella, Golden Shimmer - Roller Blind
products.description: When the sun is shining you become fascinated with the myriad ways in which it dances with colours that had never shown a hint of life before. Capella golden shimmer allows you to celebrate that natural beauty all year round with its clever use of luxurious golden threads and timeless floral patterning. Take your decor further towards the luxury end of the spectrum and something magical happens. You feel like you can do anything with your decor, and become inspired to find finishing touches that will speak volumes.
